response.job_title: Results-Driven Technology Leader | IT Strategist | Innovation Expert | CEO @ Banana Script
response.summary:
With over 9 years of experience in IT and innovation, I am a highly skilled and results-driven professional with a diverse background in roles such as VP of technology, Operations Director, Delivery Manager, Project Supervisor, Project Engineer, and Developer. My expertise lies in designing new solutions, technologies, apps, and platforms for various industries, including healthcare, edtech, insurance, mobility, and vehicle, among others.

I have successfully led and participated in multiple projects involving software development, business intelligence (BI), Internet of Things (IoT), cloud infrastructure, and more. This has given me a unique blend of skills and experience in both business areas, running operations and finance departments, as well as technical areas, including product development, project management, software development, and data analytics using various methodologies.

As a result-oriented professional, I am adept at managing hard deadlines and consistently delivering results that add value to both internal and external clients. I excel in teamwork and have excellent interpersonal skills that have helped me build and sustain strong client relationships. My leadership experience spans local, national, and international projects in countries such as Colombia, Mexico, USA, and Canada.

With my strong technical acumen, business acuity, and commitment to delivering exceptional results, I am well-equipped to drive innovation, optimize operations, and lead successful technology initiatives. 

Let's connect and explore how I can contribute to your organization's success.
response.skills: Leadership, Management, Motivational Speaking, Business Strategy, Scrum, Gestión de proyectos, Desarrollo de software, Metodologías ágiles, JIRA, Pensamiento creativo, Inglés, Lean Startup, Programación en HTML5 y CSS3, Programación en C, C++, Java., Programación en VHDL y Verilog., Manejo de matlab, simulink, labview, Orcad, Css studio, Qucs, Xilinx, entre otros., Transformación digital, Jira, Estrategia, Innovación digital

profile_positions.description:
As the leader of LATAM's tech team, I:

1. Sculpted a high-performing, tech squad of 75+ innovators ranging from PMs to Developers, QA engineers, DevOps Engineers and Designers.
2. Managed a $2M+ USD budget, sustaining a profitable department without compromising on quality or innovation.
profile_positions.title: Vice President of Technology - Nearshore

profile_positions.description: Software delivery manager for multiple projects with distributed teams between Colombia, and USA

Product design and product development consultant in the programs 'Impacta UniAndes 2020' and 'Potencia UniAndes 2020'.

profile_positions.description:
Funciones:
- Coordinar a los equipos de Soporte, Desarrollo e Infraestructura. 
- Participar en la planeación estratégica de la UEN para el año 2020.
- Operar el presupuesto de la unidad de TI y participar en la planeación presupuestal para el año 2020.
- Entregar el reporte de ejecución al gerente general en los comités de gerencia semanales.
profile_positions.title: IT Director (in charge)

profile_positions.description: Scrum Master and chief of the development team at Cesvi Colombia. Project manager in digital transformation and tech innovation projects.

profile_positions.description:
Developer. Mainly in PHP, Angular JS. MySQL.

Greatest achievement: Develop a web platform to manage the state, operation and maintenance of 4G highways in Colombia. From Scratch to 100%.
profile_positions.title: Applications Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Project engineer, lead in the electrical team.

Greatest achievements:

- Design, mounting, commissioning and setting-up process from scratch of a LV electric network for a glue factory.
- Dismantling, moving, assembly and setting-up of machines and electric equipment of Flowserve Pumps plant, from Bogotá - Colombia to Ecatepec de Morelos - Mexico.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

company.name: Banana Script
company.description:
We’re a Human-Centered company, we break any classic working model, and GIVE BUSINESS RESULTS.

We are a tech crew capable of creating the most incredible digital solutions (AI, platforms, apps, integrations) in the industry.

We generate value and impact teams, operations, business models, and budgets through our skills, knowledge, and the solutions we achieve through them.
